channel.title: Please Help me with melee switching
channel.description: Okay guys i need to know how can i make any weapon switching timing perfect because the dds timing sucks so much i want it like rs when u put it on u spec not hit once before u spec. so if anyone knows please be kind enough to tell me how. Thanks

item.title: Please Help me with melee switching
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

first of all

beast k0:

use the search buttn and fund the tUt on making deltas combat better. there. that was simple.

^ - There is no magic tut on how to fix deltas combat lag once and for all.

Now lag in delta especially combat related is all because of your process() being overstuffed and not just being called when its need, no instead its called every half of a second, you can read all about it here

http://tinyurl.com/35h8zew

However for simply fixing the dds hitting once before speccing can probly be fixed by breaking off combat if you switch weapons, atm I dont feel like spoon feeding so just have a go at it.

Read full topic
item.source: Please Help me with melee switching

item.title: Please Help me with melee switching
item.dc:creator: @abcpker711 abcpker711
item.description:
@abcpker711 wrote:

It’s not the melee coding. It’s called “Lagging” When you lag, and you click the item, an even bigger lag hits, and then you hit then have control. It’s confusing but it’s you, not the server. Try a VPS>> ASAP.

Read full topic
item.source: Please Help me with melee switching
